test.name: Reservar um voo de Paris ate Londres

kw.name: Dado que acesso o site blazedemo
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Browser Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Quando escolho o ponto de partida
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=fromPort' by value Paris.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: E Escolho o ponto de chegada
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=toPort' by value London.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Entao sou direcionado para as opções de voo
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css=div.container h3' contains exact text 'Flights from Paris to London:'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
